text: Amanda Jane Solloway (n√©e Edghill; born 6 June 1961)http://data.parliament.uk/membersdataplatform/services/mnis/members/query/House=Commons%7CIsEligible=true/ UK government finally confirms new science minister Science Business 20 Feb 2020 is a British Conservative Party politician. She was a Member of Parliament (MP) for Derby North from 2019 to 2024. She also was Science Minister from 2019 to 2024. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from Nottinghamshire Category:People from Nottingham
title: Amanda Solloway
